snippet: The home improvement store reported its quarterly income rose significantly as Americans put more money into fixing their homes.
abstract: Lowe's reports second-quarter net income of $941 million, or 88 cents a share, up 26 percent from $747 million, or 64 cents a share, in year-ago quarter; revenue rose 10 percent to $15.71 billion.
lead_paragraph: The home improvement store reported its quarterly income rose significantly as Americans put more money into fixing their homes.

headline.main: Income Up 26%, Lowe’s Raises Forecast for Year
headline.print_headline: Income Up 26%, Lowe’s Raises Forecast for Year
